file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-04-02 - MAIN LANDING GEAR AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN LANDING GEAR AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the Main Landing Gear (MLG) auxiliary brace strut. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MLG AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - RESTO- ALL 32-10-04-900-801-A ♦ RATION MLG LOWER SECONDARY SIDE STRUT ALL 32-10-04-900-802-A ASSY - RESTORATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-04-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the latest revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1191 to restore the MLG auxiliary brace strut. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING AMM TASK 32-10-04-000-801-A/400 GEAR - REMOVAL AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING AMM TASK 32-10-04-400-801-A/400 GEAR - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the MLG auxiliary brace strut (AMM TASK 32-10-04-000-801-A/400). J. Restore MLG Auxiliary Brace Strut (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the latest revision of the Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1191 to restore the MLG auxiliary brace strut. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the MLG auxiliary brace strut (AMM TASK 32-10-04-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

A 145AMM320061.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-04-900-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MLG LOWER SECONDARY SIDE STRUT ASSY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the latest revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1191 to restore the MLG Lower Secondary Side Strut Assy. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING AMM TASK 32-10-04-000-801-A/400 GEAR - REMOVAL AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT OF THE MAIN LANDING AMM TASK 32-10-04-400-801-A/400 GEAR - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) Remove the MLG secondary side strut (AMM TASK 32-10-04-000-801-A/400). J. Restore MLG Auxiliary Brace Strut SUBTASK 900-004-A (1) Refer to the latest revision of the Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1191 to restore the MLG Lower Secondary Side Strut Assy. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Install the MLG secondary side strut (AMM TASK 32-10-04-400-801-A/400).
